item.title: LeetCode128æœ€é•¿è¿ç»­åºåˆ—
item.description:
ä¸€ã€é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

é¢˜ç›®é“¾æ¥

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæœªæ’åºçš„æ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„Â numsÂ ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæ•°å­—è¿ç»­çš„æœ€é•¿åºåˆ—ï¼ˆä¸è¦æ±‚åºåˆ—å…ƒç´ åœ¨åŸæ•°ç»„ä¸­è¿ç»­ï¼‰çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚

è¯·ä½ è®¾è®¡å¹¶å®ç°æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºÂ O(n)Â çš„ç®—æ³•è§£å†³æ­¤é—®é¢˜ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

**è¾“å…¥ï¼š**nums = [100,4,200,1,3,2] **è¾“å‡ºï¼š**4 **è§£é‡Šï¼š**æœ€é•¿æ•°å­—è¿ç»­åºåˆ—æ˜¯ [1, 2, 3, 4]ã€‚å®ƒçš„é•¿åº¦ä¸º 4ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š

**è¾“å…¥ï¼š**nums = [0,3,7,2,5,8,4,6,0,1] **è¾“å‡ºï¼š**9

ç¤ºä¾‹ 3ï¼š

**è¾“å…¥ï¼š**nums = [1,0,1,2] **è¾“å‡ºï¼š**3

æç¤ºï¼š

  • 0 <= nums.length <= 105
  • -109 <= nums[i] <= 109

äºŒã€è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯

  1. æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³ ğŸ’¡åˆ©ç”¨hashè¡¨æŸ¥æ‰¾æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º$O(1)$çš„ç‰¹æ€§æ¥å¿«é€Ÿæ‰¾åˆ°å½“å‰å…ƒç´ +1
  2. ç®—æ³•æ­¥éª¤
    1. å°†åˆ—è¡¨å¡«å…¥hashè¡¨ï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨å»é‡ï¼‰
    2. éå†hashè¡¨ï¼Œ
      1. å¦‚æœå½“å‰å…ƒç´ ä¸æ˜¯åºåˆ—çš„å¼€å§‹åˆ™è·³è¿‡ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤æŸ¥æ‰¾
      2. åä¹‹åˆ™ä»å½“å‰å…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹ä¸æ–­çš„æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªcurr_nums+1
      3. æ¯è®ºæŸ¥æ‰¾ç»“æŸåæ›´æ–°å½“å‰æœ€é•¿è¿ç»­åºåˆ—
  3. æ€è·¯ ä¸€å¼€å§‹çœ‹åˆ°æ±‚æœ€é•¿è¿ç»­åºåˆ—æ—¶å°±æƒ³åˆ°äº†ç›´æ¥std::sortåä¸€è½®å¾ªç¯æå®šï¼Œä½†é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚åœ¨$O(n)$çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚å†…æå®šï¼Œè¿™å¥—æ˜¾ç„¶ä¸è¡Œã€‚é‚æ€è€ƒå…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ å‘ç°é—®é¢˜çš„æœ¬è´¨å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯éœ€è¦å¿«é€Ÿçš„æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å½“å‰æ•°å­—çš„+1ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å°±åªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨äº†ï¼Œä¸”å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨å½“å‰å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºåºåˆ—èµ·å§‹æ•°å­—æ¥é¿å…é‡å¤æŸ¥æ‰¾

ä¸‰ã€ å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)

å››ã€ä»£ç å®ç°

  1. C++å®ç°
class Solution {
public:
 // æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
 int longestConsecutive(vector<int>& nums) {
 if (nums.size() == 0)
 return 0;

 unordered_set<int> st;
 for (int num : nums)
 st.insert(num);

 int max_len = 0;
 for (int num : st)
 {
 // åªä»è¿ç»­åºåˆ—çš„èµ·ç‚¹å¼€å§‹è®¡ç®—
 if (st.count(num - 1))
 continue;

 // ä»èµ·ç‚¹å¼€å§‹å‘åæ‰©å±•
 int current_len = 1;
 int current_num = num;
 while (st.count(current_num + 1))
 {
 current_len++;
 current_num++;
 }
 max_len = max(max_len, current_len);
 }
 return max_len;
 }

 // æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šæ’åºæ³•
 int longestConsecutive2(vector<int>& nums) {
 if (nums.size() == 0)
 return 0;

 // æ’åº
 sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());
 // å»é‡
 nums.erase(std::unique(nums.begin(), nums.end()), nums.end());

 int max_len = 1;
 int tmp_len = 1;
 for(int i = 1; i< nums.size(); ++i )
 {
 if (nums[i-1] + 1 == nums[i])
 {
 tmp_len++;
 if (tmp_len > max_len)
 {
 max_len = tmp_len;
 }
 }
 else
 {
 tmp_len = 1;
 }
 }
 return max_len;
 }
};

int main()
{
 Solution solution;
 vector<int> nums = {9,1,4,7,3,-1,0,5,8,-1,6};
 int result = solution.longestConsecutive(nums);
 cout << result << endl;
 return 0;
}
  1. golang å®ç°
func longestConsecutive(nums []int) int {
 if len(nums) == 0 {
 return 0
 }

 // æ„å»ºå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
 mp := make(map[int]bool)
 for _, num := range nums {
 mp[num] = true
 }

 // æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€é•¿çš„è¿ç»­å­—æ®µ
 maxLen := 0
 for num := range mp {
 // é¿å…é‡å¤éå†: å¦‚æœnum-1å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™numä¸æ˜¯è¿ç»­å­—æ®µçš„èµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œè·³è¿‡
 if mp[num-1] {
 continue
 }

 // ä»¥numä¸ºèµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œè®¡ç®—è¿ç»­å­—æ®µçš„é•¿åº¦
 curNum := num
 curLen := 1
 for mp[curNum+1] {
 curNum++
 curLen++
 }
 if curLen > maxLen {
 maxLen = curLen
 }
 }

 return maxLen
}

func longestConsecutive2(nums []int) int {
 if len(nums) <= 0 {
 return 0
 }

 // 1. æ’åº
 sort.Ints(nums)

 // 2. æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€é•¿çš„è¿ç»­å­—æ®µ
 tmp_len := 1
 max_len := 1
 for i := 1; i < len(nums); i++ {
 if nums[i] == nums[i-1] {
 continue
 } else if nums[i] == nums[i-1]+1 {
 tmp_len++
 if tmp_len > max_len {
 max_len = tmp_len
 }
 } else {
 tmp_len = 1
 }
 }

 return max_len
}

func main() {
 nums := []int{9, 1, 4, 7, 3, -1, 0, 5, 8, -1, 6}
 result := longestConsecutive(nums)
 println(result)
}

item.title: LeetCode49 å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯åˆ†ç»„
item.description:
ä¸€ã€é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

leetcodeé“¾æ¥

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè¯·ä½ å°†Â å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯Â ç»„åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ä»»æ„é¡ºåºè¿”å›ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ã€‚

å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ : å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯æ˜¯é€šè¿‡é‡æ–°æ’åˆ—ä¸åŒå•è¯æˆ–çŸ­è¯­çš„å­—æ¯è€Œå½¢æˆçš„å•è¯æˆ–çŸ­è¯­ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨æ‰€æœ‰åŸå­—æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1:

è¾“å…¥:Â strs = ["eat", "tea", "tan", "ate", "nat", "bat"]

è¾“å‡º:Â “[["bat"],["nat","tan"],["ate","eat","tea"]]”

è§£é‡Šï¼š

  • åœ¨ strs ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é‡æ–°æ’åˆ—æ¥å½¢æˆÂ "bat"ã€‚
  • å­—ç¬¦ä¸²Â "nat"Â å’ŒÂ "tan"Â æ˜¯å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬å¯ä»¥é‡æ–°æ’åˆ—ä»¥å½¢æˆå½¼æ­¤ã€‚
  • å­—ç¬¦ä¸²Â "ate"Â ï¼Œ"eat"Â å’ŒÂ "tea"Â æ˜¯å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬å¯ä»¥é‡æ–°æ’åˆ—ä»¥å½¢æˆå½¼æ­¤ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 2:

è¾“å…¥:Â strs = [""]

è¾“å‡º:Â [[""]]

ç¤ºä¾‹ 3:

è¾“å…¥:Â strs = ["a"]

è¾“å‡º:Â [[“a”]]

æç¤ºï¼š

  • 1 <= strs.length <= 104
  • 0 <= strs[i].length <= 100
  • strs[i]Â ä»…åŒ…å«å°å†™å­—æ¯

äºŒã€è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯

  1. æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³ åŒç±»å‹çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä»…ä»…å­—æ¯é¡ºåºä¸åŒï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€å°†å…¶æ’åºåå°±å¯ä»¥ä½œä¸ºhashè¡¨ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œå®ç°å¿«é€Ÿæ‰¾åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„åˆ†ç»„
  2. ç®—æ³•æ­¥éª¤
    1. æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•ï¼šéå†ä¸€éstrså°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ’åºåæ‹¿åˆ°ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨ç´¢å¼•æ‰¾åˆ°hashè¡¨ä¸­åˆ†ç»„çš„ä½ç½®å®ç°æ’å…¥
    2. æ„å»ºç»“æœï¼šå°†hashè¡¨ä»¥é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚çš„æ–¹å¼è¿”å›
  3. ä¼˜åŒ–
    1. æ—¢ç„¶æ˜¯ä»¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ºç´¢å¼• ä¸”å°å†™å­—æ¯åªæœ‰26ä¸ªï¼Œ é‚£å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å­—æ¯å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ä½œä¸ºç´¢å¼•ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±ä¸ç”¨ç»™æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ’åºäº†ï¼Œåœ¨å•ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²éå¸¸é•¿çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ•ˆæœæ˜¾è‘—

ä¸‰ã€ å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

æ’åºæ³•

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: $O(n \times k \log k)$ï¼Œn æ˜¯æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œk æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: $O(n \times k)$ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ n ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä½œä¸º valueï¼Œæœ€å¤š n ä¸ª keyï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ª key é•¿åº¦ä¸º kï¼‰

è®¡æ•°æ³•

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š$O(n \times k)$
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š$O(n \times k)$

å››ã€ä»£ç å®ç°

  1. C++å®ç° ï¼ˆè€—æ—¶ï¼š1h20minï¼‰
class Solution {
 public:
 // è®¡æ•°æ³•
 vector<vector<string>> groupAnagrams(vector<string>& strs) {
 // 1. æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•
 unordered_map<string,vector<string>> tmp;
 for (const auto& str : strs)
 {
 string key(26,'0');
 for (const char& c : str )
 {
 key[c-'a']++;
 }
 tmp[key].push_back(str);
 }

 // 2. æ„å»ºç»“æœ
 vector<vector<string>> result;
 result.reserve(tmp.size());
 for (auto& it : tmp)
 {
 result.push_back(std::move(it.second));
 }

 // 3. è¿”å›ç»“æœ
 return result;
 }

 // æ’åºæ³•
 vector<vector<string>> groupAnagrams2(vector<string>& strs) {
 // 1. æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•
 unordered_map<string,vector<string>> tmp;
 for (const auto& str : strs)
 {
 string key = str;
 sort(key.begin(),key.end());
 tmp[key].push_back(str);
 }

 // 2. æ„å»ºç»“æœ
 vector<vector<string>> result;
 result.reserve(tmp.size());
 for (auto& it : tmp)
 {
 // tipsï¼š ä½¿ç”¨ std::move æ¥é¿å…å¤§é‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸² vector çš„æ·±æ‹·è´
 result.push_back(std::move(it.second));
 }

 // 3. è¿”å›ç»“æœ
 return result;
 }
};
  1. go å®ç°
// æ’åºæ³•
func groupAnagrams(strs []string) [][]string {
 // 1. æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆæ’åºæ³•ï¼‰
 // ç”±äº sort æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥æ’åº stringï¼Œéœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸º []byte
 mp := make(map[string][]string)
 for _, str := range strs {
 b := []byte(str)
 sort.Slice(b, func(i, j int) bool { return b[i] < b[j] })
 key := string(b)
 mp[key] = append(mp[key], str)
 }

 // 2. æ„å»ºç»“æœ
 result := make([][]string, 0, len(mp))
 for _, v := range mp {
 result = append(result, v)
 }

 return result
}

// è®¡æ•°æ³•
func groupAnagrams2(strs []string) [][]string {
 // 1. æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•
 mp := make(map[[26]int][]string)
 for _, str := range strs { // tips: éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯strä»…ä»…ä¸ºå€¼æ‹·è´ï¼Œå¹¶éå¼•ç”¨ å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ä¿®æ”¹æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ éœ€è¦è®¿é—®strs[i]
 var count [26]int
 for _, c := range str {
 count[c-'a']++
 }
 mp[count] = append(mp[count], str)
 }

 // 2. æ„å»ºç»“æœ
 // tips: ä½¿ç”¨makeæå‰é¢„åˆ†é…å®¹é‡å¯ä»¥æ˜¾è‘—å‡å°‘å†…å­˜åˆ†é…å’Œæ•°æ®å¤åˆ¶
 result := make([][]string, 0, len(mp))
 for _, v := range mp {
 result = append(result, v)
 }

 return result
}

item.title: LeetCode01 ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ
item.description:
é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

é“¾æ¥

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ nums å’Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ç›®æ ‡å€¼targetï¼Œè¯·ä½ åœ¨è¯¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾å‡º å’Œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å€¼ target çš„é‚£ ä¸¤ä¸ª æ•´æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å®ƒä»¬çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ã€‚

ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾æ¯ç§è¾“å…¥åªä¼šå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½ ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤æ¬¡ç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚

ä½ å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ä»»æ„é¡ºåºè¿”å›ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [2,7,11,15], target = 9 è¾“å‡ºï¼š[0,1] è§£é‡Šï¼šå› ä¸º nums[0] + nums[1] == 9 ï¼Œè¿”å› [0, 1] ã€‚ ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [3,2,4], target = 6 è¾“å‡ºï¼š[1,2] ç¤ºä¾‹ 3ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [3,3], target = 6 è¾“å‡ºï¼š[0,1]

è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯

æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³

ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨æ¥ä¼˜åŒ–æŸ¥æ‰¾è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å¯¹äºå½“å‰éå†åˆ°çš„æ•°nums[i]ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æ‰¾åˆ°target - nums[i]æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­ã€‚

ç®—æ³•æ­¥éª¤

  1. åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨num_to_indexï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æ•°å€¼åˆ°ç´¢å¼•çš„æ˜ å°„
  2. éå†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ nums[i]ï¼š
    • è®¡ç®—è¡¥æ•°complement = target - nums[i]
    • åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾complementæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    • å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›[num_to_index[complement], i]
    • å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå°†å½“å‰æ•°å€¼å’Œç´¢å¼•å­˜å…¥å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
  3. éå†ç»“æŸåè¿”å›ç©ºæ•°ç»„ï¼ˆé¢˜ç›®ä¿è¯æœ‰è§£ï¼Œä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œåˆ°è¿™é‡Œï¼‰

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸ç”¨æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•ï¼Ÿ

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•éœ€è¦ä¸¤å±‚å¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(nÂ²)ã€‚è€Œä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨å¯ä»¥å°†æŸ¥æ‰¾æ—¶é—´ä»O(n)é™åˆ°O(1)ï¼Œæ€»ä½“æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¼˜åŒ–åˆ°O(n)ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­næ˜¯æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦éå†ä¸€æ¬¡æ•°ç»„
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)ï¼Œå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨æœ€å¤šéœ€è¦å­˜å‚¨nä¸ªå…ƒç´ 

ä»£ç å®ç°

C++å®ç°

#include "leetcode.h"

class Solution {
 public:
 vector<int> twoSum(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
 unordered_map<int, int> num_to_index;
 for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i) {
 int complement = target - nums[i];
 // æŸ¥æ‰¾è¡¥æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
 if (num_to_index.find(complement) != num_to_index.end()) {
 return {num_to_index[complement], i};
 }
 // å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰æ•°å€¼å’Œç´¢å¼•
 num_to_index[nums[i]] = i;
 }
 return {};
 }
};

Goå®ç°

package main

func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int {
 numToIndex := make(map[int]int)
 for i, num := range nums {
 complement := target - num
 // æŸ¥æ‰¾è¡¥æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
 if idx, found := numToIndex[complement]; found {
 return []int{idx, i}
 }
 // å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰æ•°å€¼å’Œç´¢å¼•
 numToIndex[num] = i
 }
 return []int{}
}

Pythonå®ç°

class Solution(object):
 def twoSum(self, nums, target):
 """
 :type nums: List[int]
 :type target: int
 :rtype: List[int]
 """
 num_to_index = {}
 for i, num in enumerate(nums):
 complement = target - num
 # æŸ¥æ‰¾è¡¥æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
 if complement in num_to_index:
 return [num_to_index[complement], i]
 # å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰æ•°å€¼å’Œç´¢å¼•
 num_to_index[num] = i
 return []

Luaå®ç°

function twoSum(nums, target)
 local num_to_index = {}
 for i = 1, #nums do
 local num = nums[i]
 local complement = target - num
 -- æŸ¥æ‰¾è¡¥æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
 if num_to_index[complement] ~= nil then
 return {num_to_index[complement], i}
 end
 -- å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰æ•°å€¼å’Œç´¢å¼•
 num_to_index[num] = i
 end
 return {}
end

-- æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç (LeetCodeå¹³å°ä¸æ”¯æŒLuaï¼Œéœ€æ‰‹åŠ¨æµ‹è¯•)
local nums = {2, 7, 11, 15}
local target = 9
local result = twoSum(nums, target)

print("è¾“å…¥æ•°ç»„:")
for i = 1, #nums do
 io.write(nums[i] .. " ")
end
